title: Christmas Gift Guide 2018: Gifts For Him
description:
Men and boys are notoriously difficult to buy presents for, or so we’re told.
So if you’ve found yourself head-scratching for what to put under a tree this
Christmas for a man then don’t worry we’ve got your back.

Our list covers all budgets from something to put in his stocking to something
that’ll blow his socks off this is where to find it.

## Gifts under £20 for him

### [Anker Soundcore Mini £20.99](https://amzn.to/2Pta6eF)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2Pta6eF)

Although technically it just scrapes over the £20 bar we’re including it
anyway, and you won’t regret the extra £0.99 spent. That’s because the Anker
Soundcore Mini just packs in so much sound and features for such a small
speaker. Bluetooth? Check. Aux? Check. And it also has MP3 playback over
microSD, a mic for hands-free calls and, the truly oddball extra, a built-in
FM radio so you can even get some Christmas radio on the go. All able to fit
in the palm of your hand as well. Santa can’t top that.

  * **Read our[Anker Soundcore Mini review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/anker-soundcore-mini)**
  * [**Buy an Anker Soundcore Mini from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2Pta6eF)

### The Room (Switch) £9.99

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Christmas stockings are all about puzzles that’ll tease your brain while the
turkey settles and way into Boxing Day – at least that’s what we believe. The
Room on Switch capitalises on the latest craze of escape rooms and condenses
that down to a device. And as you search for clues, keys and hidden panels
it’s infused with just the right amount of horror to keep you alert for the
rest of the holidays.

  * **Read our[The Room review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/the-room-switch)**
  * **By The Room**

## Gifts under £50 for him

### [Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) £49.99](https://amzn.to/2yNdesn)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2yNdesn)

If you’re looking to splash out a bit more on a speaker, with Alexa chucked
in, then Amazon Echo Dot is the way to go. Smart home control is where Alexa
really shines, with the range of supported products huge, ranging from the
Dyson 360 Eye robot vacuum cleaner to Philips Hue bulbs and beyond. You can
create routines to control multiple devices together. So if he needs a little
help in the house then look no further.

  * **Read our[Amazon Echo Dot review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/amazon-echo-dot-3rd-gen)**
  * [**Buy an Amazon Echo Dot from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2yNdesn)

### [Fifa 19 – £41.99](https://amzn.to/2AAtGxh)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2AAtGxh)

What makes a better winter present than a reminder of summer? And by summer we
mean football. The greatest football game has a new edition with so many new
modes and other great treats with you’ll almost believe that football came
home after all.

  * **Read our[Fifa 19 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/fifa-19)**
  * [**Buy Fifa 19 Cup from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2AAtGxh)

### [Call of Duty Black Ops 4 £49.99](https://amzn.to/2SuKn3X)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2SuKn3X)

Keeping with the Christmas means time for games and what better to twin with
FIFA than the latest from Call of Duty? After successfully claiming the World
Cup you can then shoot your way right through to the New Year on Call of Duty
Black Ops 4.  
This year’s CoD has done away with the single player campaign and expanded its
three distinctive multiplayer segments so the whole family can work their way
through the leftovers whilst shooting the hell out of each other across PvP
mode, a cooperative zombie mode and a battle royal called Blackout.

  * **Read our[Call of Duty Black Ops 4 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/call-of-duty-black-ops-4)**
  * [**Buy Call of Duty Black Ops 4 from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2SuKn3X)

## Gifts under £100 for him

### [Kindle £59.99](https://amzn.to/2OYRa80)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2OYRa80)

Perhaps though multiplayer shoot everything in sight is not exactly his style
and he needs a good excuse to escape the family seek out some solitude. In
which case Amazon enter our list for a second time with another budget version
of a gadget, this time with its no thrills Kindle.  
It may not have all the design quirks or fancy features of more eminent
e-books, see Kindle Voyage if you’re a stickler for backlight or high-
resolution displays and want to spend a little more, but for only £60 the
Kindle does exactly what an e-reader should. It gives you the ability to turn
a hardback collection into one 6inch portable device and grants you access to
Amazon’s online book collection. It’s reading done simply and done well.

  * **Read our[Kindle review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/amazon-kindle)**
  * [**By a Kindle from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2OYRa80)

### [Amazon Fire HD £79.99](https://amzn.to/2AB5gnr)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2AB5gnr)

OK – It’s a hat-trick of Amazon budget gadgets, we know. But when they’re
cramming in this much bang for your proverbial buck there’s not a lot can you
argue with. The Amazon Fire HD 8 combines the best of an e-reader, with an
8-inch screen to access Prime and Alexa thrown in as well. Basically if you
were reading this list and had it narrowed down to the Kindle and the Amazon
Echo Dot, then this has just solved your problem into an all achieving tablet
that comes in way under £100.  
Though to truly get the most out of it we recommend splashing out an extra £30
to get the ‘Show Mode’ charging dock addition.

  * **Read our[Amazon Fire HD review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/amazon-fire-hd-8)**
  * [**Buy an Amazon Fire HD from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2AB5gnr)

### [Audio-Technica SonicFuel ATH-AR3BT £99](https://amzn.to/2yE6NaC)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2yE6NaC)

Solid wireless headphones, which are made for good sound rather than use in a
gym in mind, for less than three figures are becoming increasingly difficult
to find. The Audio-Technica SonicFuel ATH-AR3BT are simply good quality
headphones that deliver a great audio performance with aptX Bluetooth for
better sound compression and do not bother to try to do any unnecessary
extras.

  * **Read our[Audio-Technica SonicFuel ATH-AR3BT review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/audio-technica-ath-ar3bt)**
  * [**Buy an Audio-Technica SonicFuel ATH-AR3BT from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2yE6NaC)

## Gifts under £200 for him

### Spotify (year’s subscription) £120 12x£10-a-month

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Staying with music, what makes for a better Christmas present than one you can
keep enjoying until Christmas next year? Not much in our book. For any wannabe
music aficionado or for over a year’s access anyone with even a passing
interest in music would love unlimited access to the over 35 million songs
that make up the Spotify library.

In addition its strongest features includes making collaborative playlists
with friends, so you can share with him some tunes for an upcoming party or
just educate him with some music. It’s the gift that will keep on giving for
both of you all through the year.

  * **Read our[Spotify Premium review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/spotify-premium)**
  * **Buy Spotify Premium**

### [Moto G6 Play £169](https://amzn.to/2DbA1Sf)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2DbA1Sf)

If music is already sorted for the year and beyond then what he’ll need is a
phone with enough storage to make the most out of it when commuting or stuck
in the snow over the festive period. The Moto G6 Play provides a generous
amount of space, for its price, at 32GB. It loses some of the added features
of the Moto G6, which you could get for an extra £50, such as higher-
resolution camera and better camera. But if he’s more about having a practical
phone that has storage and keeping standard features, that are becoming
increasingly luxury, like a headphone jack then this phone ticks all the
boxes.

  * **Read our[Moto G6 Play review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-g6-play)**
  * **Buy a[Moto G6 Play from Amazon](https://amzn.to/2DbA1Sf)**

### [Withering Steel HR Sport Watch £189.95](https://amzn.to/2OWQkZu)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2OWQkZu)

Need some motivation to run off some Christmas turkey, the Withering Steel HR
Sport Watch is here to monitor every step taken. First and foremost though it
is a watch, and designed to look as such, with the fitness tracker as a
secondary function. That said it is quite an extensive secondary feature
possessing, on top of the basic things like heart rate and step counter, 30
different work outs that it can track including activities like zumba.

  * **Read our[Withering Steel HR Sport Watch review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/steel-hr-sport)**
  * [**Buy a Witherings Steel HR Sport Watch from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2OWQkZu)

## Expensive gifts for him

### Panasonic FZ950/FZ952 £2499

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

If he’s been exceptionally good this year then look no further than the
Panasonic FZ950/FZ952 OLED. There’s really not too much to expand on. You like
film? TV? You like watching crisp defined pictures with powerful sound? Then
this top of the range 55-inch, different sizes available, Panasonic TV is up
there with the best of the year.

  * **Read **our** [Panasonic FZ950/FZ952 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/panasonic-fz950-fz952-oled)**
  * **By a Panasonic FZ950/FZ952**

### [Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus £779](https://amzn.to/2CMcdn2)

To really truly splash out this Christmas then this is the current barometer
for a smartphone. The slick design makes some pretty recent iPhone and other
android editions look obsolete already. Every additional feature that the Moto
G6 Play, above, lacked the Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus has and then some. The
screen is both big and brilliant at 6.2 inches and resolution of 2960 x 1440,
with an aspect ratio of 18.5:9. This is a phone with it all for a Christmas
with nothing held back.

  * **Read the[Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s8-plus)**
  * [**Buy a Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CMcdn2)
